title: Did an Unidentified Woman Warn Las Vegas Concert-Goers They Were ‘All Going to Die’?
subtitle: An apparent altercation between concert-goers was blown out of proportion, and the witness who reported the threats has changed her view on their significance.
author: Dan MacGuill
vclaim: During a concert in Las Vegas on 1 October 2017, a "mystery woman" warned or threatened crowds about the mass shooting that took place shortly afterwards.
